description:
Posted: October 16, 2023 
  The Legal Assistant provides administrative and clerical support within a professional legal environment. The Legal Assistant is responsible for coordinating a variety of administrative procedures to ensure a high standard of quality and customer service. 
 
 Key Responsibities 
 
  Preparation of correspondence and legal documentation including extensive editing and quality assurance 
  Preparation of legal documentation to be filed with various courts 
  Coordinate external and internal communication including mail, courier packages, e-mail, fax, and telephone calls 
  Daily maintenance of client files and address client inquiries as required 
  Preparation of client files for closure and storage 
  Daily preparation of dockets 
  Preparation of accounts 
  Coordinate and organize meetings, conference calls and maintain agenda 
  Coordinate travel arrangements, as applicable 
  Assist with other projects and support other departments as required 
 
 
 Qualifications 
 
  Office Administration – Legal or Law Clerk diploma from recognized post-secondary institute or suitable combination of education and experience 
  Minimum one year of law office experience in family law 
  Strong working knowledge of MS Office suite (Word, Excel, Outlook, PowerPoint) and DivorceMate 
  Strong verbal and written communication skills 
  Strong interpersonal skills and professional presentation 
  Basic office equipment experience 
  Customer relations experience 
  Experience preparing and editing correspondence 
 
 
 Skills Required 
 
  Ability to plan, organize and prioritize job tasks in order to meet tight deadlines 
  Ability to respond effectively and professionally to changes in schedules and priorities 
  Ability to ensure consistent attention to detail 
  Ability to work independently within a team environment 
  Ability to exercise discretion when dealing with sensitive information 
  A positive, supportive, and professional attitude 
  
 Interested applicants should forward their resumes to [email protected].
